lines.text: What's the matter, dreamboat? Didn't you have your vitamins this morning?
Promises, my dear lady, are the counterfeit currency that inferior people exact from each other when unsure of their own strength.

[Entering the room]
I always ring that gong, gentlemen, to warn people to stop talking about me behind my back.
Oh, Michael! I thought I was going to lose you because you were a rich man and now you haven't got a quarter! Isn't it wonderful?
Have you any idea how many toy trains are wrecked by fathers on Christmas Day, and how difficult it is to work a railroad system if one is over 10 years old?
What shall it be, Canada or the Amazon?
For heaven's sake, stay away from those dreadful places.
I never drink when I'm working.
We're both leaving town tonight, but you're goin' first. Where's your hat and coat?
Make Michael stop picking on me.
The sea is a wide place, and it has no tongue.
